courseSectionInformation: 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. May be repeated in the same term to a maximum of 6 hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
description: Participation in faculty-supervised research as a member of a transdisiplinary team investigating questions related to the health and well-being of children and families. Students propose their own research questions and present findings developed from data gathered by the team. 1 to 4 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. May be repeated in the same term to a maximum of 6 hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
label: Applied Research Methods
